title: PagePart Announces Partnership with Weebly to Offer Facebook Ads in New App Center
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/1/2015 @ 4:53 PM   PagePart 
CAMBRIDGE, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- PagePart, the online marketing service that makes advertising simple for small business, today announced that it was selected as a launch partner for Weebly's new App Center. PagePart's AdVisor app will help Weebly users more easily reach new customers through Facebook advertising. It is available immediately. 
PagePart AdVisor makes it easy to create Facebook ads through guided prompts and predefined templates. Weebly users have their product catalogs automatically integrated into the AdVisor application and ad creation process. Once a Weebly user makes an ad, AdVisor launches and monitors it to ensure successful results for the business. 
Facebook is one of the most effective places to advertise right now. It offers precise targeting, massive scale (over one billion users), and the power of the "social graph," the network of friends of users. PagePart will help Weebly users leverage this powerful marketing channel. 
Weebly's App Center was created to provide a simple place for entrepreneurs to grow and manage their online businesses. AdVisor is integrated into the Weebly dashboard, making it simple for any Weebly customer to quickly generate an ad. AdVisor takes the guesswork out of the process, acting like an automated ad agency . 
"We're excited to be a launch partner with Weebly. They make it simple for any small business or nonprofit to have a great website," said Randy Parker, founder and CEO of PagePart. "Now, with our AdVisor service, Weebly customers have an easy way to reach new and existing customers via Facebook advertising." 
Parker, a pioneer in the small business marketing field who previously founded Constant Contact (NASDAQ:CTCT), leads a team deeply experienced in solving the marketing needs of smaller organizations. 
Learn more about the PagePart AdVisor App on Weebly at: https://www.weebly.com/app-center/pagepart-advisor 
About PagePart 
PagePart is focused on innovative yet simple ways to automate "marketing that works" for smaller businesses. It is dedicated to helping business owners stay focused on what they do best: running their businesses. 
Leading the way is PagePart AdVisor, which aims to be the best way to make Facebook advertising successful for smaller businesses. Through its distribution via partners, AdVisor enables small businesses to create and launch ads with minimal time and effort. Small businesses can grow and succeed by leveraging this very powerful marketing channel. 
About Weebly 
Founded in 2007, Weebly is a San Francisco-based, global platform that lets people easily create a unique website, blog or online store. Millions around the world use Weebly to start their own business, sell online, showcase their achievements and communicate with visitors in a thoughtful and meaningful way. Designed with the first-time business owner in mind, Weebly gives everyone the freedom to build a high-quality site that works brilliantly across any device. Weebly offers a range of pricing options, including free and premium consumer plans, as well as enterprise offerings and is consistently the highest-rated website building mobile app in the App Store and Google Play.
